name: Icons & You â€“ Fundamentals Worksheet
description:
Are your icons a weird mish-mash of styles? Did a client give you a brand set you have to match for a mobile app? How even???

Wonder no more, as we go through some basics around UI icons, and how to make them consistent.

Included are two main pieces:

1. A worksheet that accompanies the Figma workshop I gave with Rogie on June 22, 2020. Watch and draw along: https://youtu.be/S9P7ob7Nx5I

2. Reference sheets detailing the info from the presentation
